mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders(order_code, user_num, prod_num, order_total, order_quantity, order_postalcode, order_roadaddr, order_detailaddr) VALUES(#{order_code}, #{user_num}, #{prod_num}, #{order_total}, #{order_quantity}, #{order_postalcode}, #{order_roadaddr}, #{order_detailaddr})

INSERT INTO pay(user_num, order_code, pay_method, pay_card_company, pay_card_num, pay_total_price) VALUES(#{user_num}, #{order_code}, #{pay_method}, #{pay_card_company}, #{pay_card_num}, #{pay_total_price})
